channel.title: My players cant run client
channel.description:
Ok i have this problem and like all of them said they cant run client..
Idk what it is but heres the run
@ECHO OFF title iDart "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m com/dynasty/client pause
Can you help me please?
Thanks
~crystal~

item.title: My players cant run client
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

yeh, tell em to replace there run.bat with this;

[code]TITLE Client
@echo off
cls

java -Xmx800M EGUI

pause

[/code]

Where you see

EGUI, you might need to replace it with something like “Gui” “client” etc…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2009, 12:18:53 pm[/size][hr][quote=“r0ckstar96, post:12, topic:294545”]I thought JDK was just for servers, what about JRE?[/quote]

No idea lol, i don’t have JRE and still run client/servers fine (Accept for port already in use bug i’ve got atm…)

Read full topic

item.title: My players cant run client
item.dc:creator: @tracuer93 tracuer93
item.description:
@tracuer93 wrote:

easy, do the following:
@ECHO OFF
title iDart
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6(change this to your current java)\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512m com/dynasty/client
pause

ex: mine is: java1.6.0_14

Read full topic

are you able to run it?

My run.bat in my client is different from yours…

java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32

The thing that you hava seems to be froma compiler but im just saying cuz i havnt seen a run.bat cmd like that in a client b4

item.title: My players cant run client
item.dc:creator: @K4rn4ge K4rn4ge
item.description:
@K4rn4ge wrote:

Some of your peoples may not have JDK 15 and they would need to change it to theres…

So if they had JDK 13 ( i have 14) it would look like this

@ECHO OFF
title iDart
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512m com/dynasty/client
pause

Thats it

O and make sure they extract cuzz some people arer stupid and try to run it in the copressed folder…

Read full topic
